Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.BrowserVersion.FIREFOX_31
    as of 2.17
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient.closeAllWindows()
    as of 2.16, please use WebClient.close(), or try-with-resources statement
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.SgmlPage.createDomDocumentFragment()
    as of 2.18, please use SgmlPage.createDocumentFragment() instead
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.xml.XmlPage.createXmlElement(String)
    as of 2.18, please use XmlPage.createElement(String) instead
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.xml.XmlPage.createXmlElementNS(String, String)
    as of 2.18, please use XmlPage.createElementNS(String, String) instead
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.xml.XmlPage.getContent()
    as of 2.18, please use SgmlPage.getWebResponse().getContentAsString()
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.xml.XmlPage.getXmlElementDescendants()
    as of 2.18, please use DomNode.getDomElementDescendants() instead
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlElement.type(char, boolean, boolean, boolean)
    as of 2.18, please use HtmlElement.type(Keyboard) instead
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlElement.type(int, boolean, boolean, boolean)
    as of 2.18, please use HtmlElement.type(Keyboard) instead
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlElement.type(String, boolean, boolean, boolean)
    as of 2.18, please use HtmlElement.type(Keyboard) instead
